title: Im a gay kindergarten teacher in Florida. These are the questions Im asking myself.

sentence: On Sundays episode of Last Week Tonight, Oliver lit into Florida governor Ron DeSantis, whom he correctly described as having Green Book vibes,? and took the politician to task for his crusade against Disney.
author: Chris Murphy
title: John Oliver Thinks Ron DeSantis Is a Right-Wing Dipshit Whos Scared of Gay People

title: HBOs John Oliver: Disney Should Pay More Taxes but Not Because of Dipsh*t DeSantis
